title: 通过Performancing for Firefox发布Blog - 垃圾-CarlZeng
excerpt: Thank you for contacting NetSuite Customer Support regarding creating a custom record type/list similar to the Address tab. I found that it is not possible using normal customization. To workaroun...
content:
Thank you for contacting NetSuite Customer Support regarding creating a custom record type/list similar to the Address tab. I found that it is not possible using normal customization. To workaroun…

Thank you for contacting NetSuite Customer Support regarding creating a custom record type/list similar to the Address tab.
 
I found that it is not possible using normal customization. To workaround that, you may just create custom record types (Setup > Customization > Record Types) and display them in the tabs of the record where you want to see them.
 
I hope this information is useful to you. If you have further concerns or questions on this, just email back or call into the toll-free number to re-open this case.
 
Thank you and have a good day!  

Thank you,

Olivia Dy

通过Performancing for Firefox发布Blog - 博客园

垃圾 !!!  通过这个发布完了  每次还得登陆blog管理  来选中’发布’  在发布才可以在blog 首页看到 这样的话 这个发布的便捷被大打折扣!!

我必须说明 : 这个东西 cnblog还可以做得更好的。。。。。？？？

Thank you for contacting NetSuite Customer Support regarding creating a custom record type/list similar to the Address tab.
 
I found that it is not possible using normal customization. To workaround that, you may just create custom record types (Setup > Customization > Record Types) and display them in the tabs of the record where you want to see them.
 
I hope this information is useful to you. If you have further concerns or questions on this, just email back or call into the toll-free number to re-open this case.
 
Thank you and have a good day!  

Thank you,

Olivia Dy
